Detailed Description

Represents a bounded item which can get a VCard as input. When adding the VCardItem to the editor document, a clone of the VCardItem will be made so that the original VCardItem can be deleted at any time.

VCardItem::VCardItem (  const VCard &  vcard  )  [explicit]
 

Parameters:
vcard VCard which should be displayed. A copy of the VCard is kept inside the VCardItem, which means that the passed VCard can be deleted at any time.

Member Function Documentation

AtomItem * VCardItem::Clone (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a flat copy of this object, hence the cloned object and the original object are pointing to the same VCard.
